duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement SAP Concur services and Service Administration procurement.
Act as a functional expert in the implementation and provide service solutions.
Gather client's business requirements quickly and effectively to design and configure SAP Concur services.
Manage Finance – AP department expectations, drive client deliverables, and exercise scope control to ensure project completion on schedule.
Conduct effective training and product demonstrations with Finance and Extended User Group.
Provide consultative expertise to the Finance IT and AP department, including guiding stakeholders through key decisions and tradeoffs to maintain project scope and timeline.

education_certification.credential: Certification as a SAP Concur Associate
